data.name: Re-Spawn Tournament
data.detailed_description:
Re-Spawn Tournament is a competitive, arena-style multi-player first person shooter game with fast-paced, high energy combat that requires both reflexive skill and tactical thinking. Re-Spawn Tournament is strongly influenced by FPS classics like Quake 2, Quake 3 Arena, and Unreal Tournament. Just playing one match will flood your mind with memories and nostalgia of the good old days when FPS games were raw and in your face.

With our unique handicap system, Re-Spawn Tournament will appeal to veterans and new players alike, take on more experienced players with no disadvantage.

Use the map, Use your perks, Use your weapon ... but always try to win.

Features

  • Multiplayer Game Modes - Conquest, Capture the Flag, Rush, Team Deathmatch, Free for All, and Kill Confirmed.
  • Weapons & Control - First Person, Third Person, Dynamic Crosshair, Leaning, Weapon Sway, Knife & Grenade, Fire modes (burst, auto, & semi).
  • Ballistics - Bullet Drop, Bullet Penetration, and Recoil.
  • Gameplay - Global/Team Chat, Sniper Scope, A.I. players (Bots), Hit marker, Kill feed, Melee, Compass, and Class & Perk selection.

More features will be added as the game develops!

data.short_description: Re-Spawn Tournament is a competitive, arena-style multi-player first person shooter game with fast-paced, high energy combat that requires both reflexive skill and tactical thinking.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Linux compatible graphics card with 3D acceleration
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Linux compatible sound card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The game depicts usage of weapons and explosives in various formats used by players and bots to kill other players and bots.
